name: Zodiac Hentai - Hellish Memory
description:
In this game you have to memorize the cards while surviving a real hell of bullets with illustrations of beautiful sexy girls. Challenge your skill, your reflexes, your memory and dodge the shots to leave the girls as they came into the world.

Features:
  • 36 stages with your own illustrations;
  • Differentiated gameplay;
  • High re-playability;
  • Difficults for all playstyles;
  • Classification system;
  • A surprise for the most assiduous.
